nodes.bodyText: It is better to drop the earliest in general.
Can you explain why? Are later links somehow better than earlier ones? What's the business rationale here? [the code is much more efficient if we can just drop the later ones]
I think this makes more sense to be an issue for all dropped things (attributes, links, events).
so suggestion is to remove the todo and create an issue to discuss and make a decision on what to do with the dropped things.
